item.title: Thursday, January 16, 2020
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Complete Lesson 13 Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, January 16, 2020
item.description: Do Now: What is a conditional? Write the answer in your journal. Complete the rest of Lesson 13 in Code.org Exit Ticket: If I set a sprite’s visibility property to false, what happens to the sprite? Write the answer in your journal.

item.title: Thursday, January 16, 2020
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Complete Lesson 4 Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.description: Do Now: Get our your T-Chart Check out the code demo on the big screen Complete Level 2 in Lesson 13 Complete Level 3 Complete Level 4 Complete Level 5 Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Monday, January 13, 2020
item.description: Do Now: Look over your T-Chart Take quiz Do level 2 of Lesson 12 as a class Complete level 3 Complete level 4 Complete level 5 Exit Ticket: Log out of Google Classroom and Code.org

item.title: January 10, 2020
item.description: Do Now: Add the new code to your T-Chart Complete Level 5 Complete Level 6 Watch the video on Level 9 Exit Ticket: Explain to Mr. Houston and example of a conditional from your life.

item.title: January 10, 2020
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Finish Lesson 11 Do the extra challenges Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Friday, January 10, 2020
item.description: Take your quiz Finish up your Activity Guide from yesterday Have a great weekend!

item.title: Thursday, January 9, 2020
item.description: Do Now: Answer the questions in the Do Now posted in Google Classroom Play the Stand Up, Sit Down game Go through vocab as a class + add it to your T-Chart Work through the demos with Ms. Coxwell Complete level 2 Complete level 3 Complete level 4 Exit Ticket: Make sure you have all the vocab written in your T-Chart. Log out of Google Classroom and Code.org.

item.title: Thursday, January 9, 2020
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Play the Stand Up, Sit Down game Go through vocab as a class + add it to your T-Chart Work through the demos with Ms. Coxwell Independent work Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Thursday, January 9, 2020
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Go through lesson vocab Review the Activity Guide and reference guide Do the first two problems as a class Complete the Activity Guide independently or with a partner Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Wednesday, January 8, 2020
item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Get with a partner Develop a set of instructions to find the smallest card Complete the Minimum Card Algorithm activity guide wtih your partner Turn in the activity guide Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket

item.title: Tuesday, January 7, 2020
item.description: Do Now: Write the 3 steps to drawing a sprite in your notebook Click on the link to the animation in Google Classroom and see what the animation does Remix the project linked in Google Classroom and work on making it look like the animation you saw Exit Ticket: In your notebook, write down the date and time of Family Coding Night. The information is on the flyer you looked at for your Do Now.

The information is on the flyer you looked at for your Do Now.

item.description: Complete and turn in your Do Now Complete the Drawing Activity Guide found in the first bubble of Lesson 1 Attach your completed Activity Guide to the assignment in Google Classroom and turn it in Participate in the wrap-up class discussion Complete and turn in your Exit Ticket
